bibl.title: Ptolemaic Chronology in the Phoenician Inscriptions from Cyprus.
bibl.note: Notes on Ptolemy Phildelphus' chronology. - See also p. 190: O.G.I.S., I, 17 (in Greek and Phoenician) refers to a victory gained by Soter, probably that of 295.
bibl.seg: Teixidor Javier, Ptolemaic Chronology in the Phoenician Inscriptions from Cyprus.
Notes on Ptolemy Phildelphus' chronology. - See also p. 190: O.G.I.S., I, 17 (in Greek and Phoenician) refers to a victory gained by Soter, probably that of 295.
